statements: UPDATE machine_learning_results SET prediction_date = '2022-01-15', prediction_result = '{"accuracy": 0.85}' WHERE model_name = 'Logistic Regression' AND id = 1
UPDATE machine_learning_results SET model_name = 'Random Forest', prediction_result = '{"accuracy": 0.92}' WHERE prediction_date = '2022-02-28'
UPDATE machine_learning_results SET model_name = 'Decision Tree', prediction_result = '{"accuracy": 0.85, "precision": 0.78, "recall": 0.82}' WHERE id = 1

UPDATE machine_learning_results SET prediction_date = '2022-09-30', model_name = 'Logistic Regression', prediction_result = '{"accuracy": 0.92, "precision": 0.89, "recall": 0.87}' WHERE model_name = 'Random Forest'
UPDATE machine_learning_models SET model_name = 'Logistic Regression', model_type = 'Classification' WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE predictions SET output_result = 'Positive' WHERE prediction_id = 2;
UPDATE machine_learning_models SET training_data_url = 'http://example.com/training_data_1.csv', prediction_output_url = 'http://example.com/prediction_output_1.csv' WHERE model_id = 1;
UPDATE predictions SET output_result = 'Successful' WHERE prediction_id = 1;
UPDATE model_info SET model_description = 'Updated model description' WHERE model_name = 'Linear Regression';
UPDATE model_results SET prediction = 'Yes' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE model_results SET prediction = 'High' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE model_info SET model_description = 'New Model Description' WHERE model_name = 'Model B'
UPDATE model_results SET model_name = 'New Model' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE predictions SET input_data = '{"feature1": 0.5, "feature2": 0.3}' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE model_results SET model_name = 'updated_model_name', result_json = '{"updated": true}' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE evaluation_metrics SET metric_value = 0.85, metric_name = 'updated_metric_name' WHERE model_id = '1b8e4bc3-b49a-4b91-92e3-4c413b429c12' AND metric_name = 'accuracy';
UPDATE machine_learning_models SET accuracy = 0.95 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE model_parameters SET parameter_value = 0.001 WHERE parameter_name = 'learning_rate';
UPDATE machine_learning_models SET model_name = 'Random Forest', accuracy = 0.85 WHERE id = 1
